mapper.select: SELECT id, email, password, nickname, created_at AS createdAt, social_type_code AS socialTypeCode, social_id AS socialId, tone_type AS toneType FROM users WHERE social_type_code = #{socialTypeCode} AND social_id = #{socialId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(email, password, nickname, social_type_code, social_id) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{socialTypeCode}, #{socialId})
